description: The Duke of Alba Receiving the Pope's Blessing in the Cathedral of Sainte-Gudule, Brussels; Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres (French, 1780 - 1867); 1815; Pen and brown ink, and brown wash, heightened with white gouache, with black and red chalk and graphite; Sheet: 43 × 52.9 cm (16 15/16 × 20 13/16 in.); 95.GA.12; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
